Clear And Present Danger.definition: a risk or threat to safety or other public interests that is serious and imminent ;esp
Clear And Present Danger.origin: [a clear and present danger of harm to others or himself]

1.1: a risk or threat to safety or other public interests that is serious and imminent

2.1: one that justifies limitation of a right (as freedom of speech or press) by the legislative or executive branch of government [a
2.clear and present danger: of harm to others or himself] see also
